title: October 15, 2019: Pundi X (NPXS): Down 3.65%
text:
How Did Pundi X’s Price Fare Yesterday?

Pundi X is down by approximately 3.65% from the previous day, with its price currently hovering around $0.0002033 USD. Yesterday’s down day is a reversal of the day before it; in terms of trend, though, note that the current price is now 13.97% below its 20 day moving average, and is currently in a down trend over the past 14 days. Pundi X’s expected trading range — as forecasted by the Bollinger bands indicator, which determines a range based on momentum and volatility over the past two weeks — is between $0.000211 and $0.000261. Given its boundaries, rangebound traders may find it compelling to entertain buying, as we are nearer to the bottom of the range.

Trade Pundi x (NPXS) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The market capitalization of Pundi X, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $49 million.

Straight Off the Chain

511 transactions amongst holders of Pundi X occurred yesterday. Regarding a tally of holders, Yesterday saw Pundi X’s wallet count rise by 29. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has Pundi X ranked 22 out of the 35 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

Just How Rich are Pundi X’s Richest Holders?

The top 1,000 Pundi X wallets hold over 87.94% of the token’s total money supply. The percent of the currency that is owned by wallets that are both belonging to exchanges and in the top 1,000 richest wallets of the token comes out to 11.83% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by -0.15% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by -0.24%. Pundi X’s smart contract owns approximately 0.02% of its own total money supply. This amount hasn’t changed over the past week.

How Much Development is Occurring?

In terms of how active the software development team working on Pundi X is, it may be worth observing that the last time any work pertaining to code was done on their GitHub code repository was on September 27, 2019, or approximately 18 days before. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Pundi X’s GitHub repositories grow by 0 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.03.

The Latest on Pundi X and Social Media

If you are interested in following Pundi X on social media, Twitter, where it has 66,642 following it, may be a good place to start. Here is the Twitter page for Pundi X.

Where to Buy

You can trade Pundi x, listed under the symbol NPXS, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX.

Article by SixJupiter
